DOC.brief_summary: We propose to investigate the response to Restasis, over a prolonged period of time in heavy computer users with dry eye disease.
DOC.brief_title: Objective Measurements of Prolonged Effects of Restasis on Dry Eye Disease
DOC.criteria: Using computers more than three hours per day Having dry eye symptoms based on results on the OSDI Scores of 15 or greater on the OSDI will be considered to have the disorder An abnormal confocal image of 5 or greater. All corneal disorders except for tear disorders.
